title.rendered: Nauru Airlines Phone number / Email / Address

content.rendered:
Nauru Airlines Nauru Air Corporation, trading as Nauru Airlines (formerly trading as Our Airline and Air Nauru) is the flag carrier airline of the Republic of Nauru. It operates scheduled international services to other Pacific islands and Australia. It was founded on 1970. Its main base is Nauru International Airport. Its head office is on the property of Nauru International Airport, Yaren District, and its operations office is in Brisbane, Queensland, Australia.  On the 15 July 2014, the airline announced that it would change the name of the airline to Nauru Airlines, effective 1 August 2014.

Verified & Updated on: 19/04/21

 Nauru Airlines head office Address: Nauru International Airport, PO Box 40 Republic of Nauru

 Nauru Airlines postal address:PO Box 10355 Adelaide Street, Brisbane QLD 4000

 Nauru Airlines operations office address:Level 2, 99 Creek Street, Brisbane QLD 4000

Nauru Airlines customer care / call centre

 Within Australia: 1300 369044

From Overseas: +61 7 32296455

Business hours: NA

Nauru Airlines Call Centres Majuro

Majuro – Nauru Airlines

Within Marshall Islands

 Air Marshall Islands:  625 3733

 Pacific Unique Travel: 625 3409

Nauru Airlines Call Centres in Nauru

Nauru – Nauru Airlines

 Within Nauru: 5577000

Nauru Airlines Call Centres Kiribati

Kiribati – Air Kiribati

 Within Kiribati:  686 740 28715

Nauru Airlines Call Centres Fiji

Fiji – One World Flight Centre

 Within Fiji – SUVA: 331 5311

 Within Fiji – NADI: 670 8156

Nauru Airlines Cargo Contact

 Nauru Airlines T +674 557 7003

Nauru Airlines Official website: http://www.nauruairlines.com.au/

Nauru Airlines Online Check-in: www. Nauru Airlines .com/in/gb/online check-in

Note:Online Check in for all flights opens 3 hours before the scheduled departure time and closes 1 hour prior to departure.

Check Nauru Airlines flight schedule here: www. Nauru Airlines .com/in/gb/flight schedule

Check Nauru Airlines flight status here: www. Nauru Airlines .com/in/gb/flight status

Nauru Airlines Baggage Allowance

Nauru Airlines Baggage

View Nauru Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Nauru Airlines Group Booking:

For group booking, request for the form via fax or email

Fax: +61 7 3229 6433

Email: reservations@ourairline.com.au

Nauru Airlines Special Assistance | Special Needs | Special Meals

For the requirements on special meals or special assistance, please email to reservations@nauruairlines.com.au

Travel while pregnant with Nauru Airlines

Expectant mothers can travel up to the end of the 36th week for single pregnancies and the end of the 32nd week of multiple pregnancies (e.g. twins).

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Nauru Airlines

Total fleet: 7

Boeing 737

  • Boeing 737-300

Queries handled by Nauru Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Nauru Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Nauru Airlines: (click on the stars below)
